author: will7466
content: Thanks <@!378595508748550145> - Right now we're mostly focused on getting us to a phase 1.5 and eth 1 & 2  merge right now and iterating on eth1. Ewasm team has been supporting a lot of the eth1.x efforts in addition to investigating eth1x64. We've been implementing account abstraction and other efforts to begin expanding into a phase 2 vision down the road. Here is where an expanded, full phase 2 has been left at for now - https://ethresear.ch/t/a-short-history-and-a-way-forward-for-phase-2/6982

author: will7466
content: I would recommend a session like this being more focused on the vision of phase 1.5 or a minimal phase 2 which has eth executing shards interacting with a large pool of data shards.
